General.Name: Zhejiang Founder Motor Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Founder Motor Co., Ltd. provides micro-motor and controllers worldwide. It also offers energy saving and EV traction motor assembly and automobile control systems. The company's products include EV traction motors, micro motors, EV inverters, and commercial EV drive systems. Its products are used in low-speed electric vehicles, light trucks, low-voltage electric vehicles, passenger vehicles, CMB, buses, engineering vehicles, etc. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Lishui, China.
General.Address: No. 73, Shi Niu Road, Lishui, China
